Room.Name: Ogre's Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the main fighting area. Crowds shout and cheer at the arrival of new entertainment.
Room.LongDescription: The blood of less fortunate fighters is splattered across the walls and You wonder what fate holds in store for you. To the northeast you see a door leading to The Cage, which is the one-on-one combat arena for Matriess the destroyer. Only the most skilled warriors should attempt to fight there.
